comment.body:
> 
`rocketnews24.com,youpouch.com,soranews24.com#%#//scriptlet("abort-on-property-read", "document.createElement")`. If this works, 

when this rule enabled,websites adblock message does not displayed.

`rocketnews24.com,youpouch.com,soranews24.com#%#//scriptlet('abort-on-stack-trace', 'document.createElement', '_static')` 

when this rule enabled,adblock message displayed.

comment.body:
HNY too!
> when this rule enabled,websites adblock message does not displayed.

Nice to hear! Then please turn advanced protection off and check there's no side effect for non-premium user with DNS filtering on and off. Ofc if DNS filtering is on, the images will not be displayed.

comment.body:
Site only opens with US VPN  and then it is broken too, likely that cable provider is only allowing their customers to open it.
These rules restore some content on that page though (not all since not available in code):
```
mediacomcable.com#$#.white-overlay { padding-top: 0px !important; padding-bottom: 0px !important; background-color: inherit !important; }
mediacomcable.com#$#.mainContainer.white-overlay::before { position: static !important; content: " " !important; }
```

Please check @zloyden (likely some rule in user filter or maybe ISP is injecting something which AdGuard hides).

comment.body:
Resolved by List-KR filter.
The patch will be available in up to 4 hours.
After that time, you can download it by touching `Check for updates` in AdGuard home.

<details>
<summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

List-KR 필터에 의해 해결되었습니다.
패치는 최대 4시간안에 사용하실 수 있습니다.
최대 4시간이 지난 후에 AdGuard 홈에 있는 `업데이트 확인`을 터치해서 다운로드하실 수 있습니다.

</details>

issue.title: soranews24.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://soranews24.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsoranews24.com%2F) ### Comment > AdGuard is detected and blocks content from news articles. Primary images are blocked from the third article and on from the homepage. Within articles, all supporting images are blocked. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/pLDpC4h.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/WUpqsl7.png)
